carouselOptions.description: Configuration options forwarded to the underlying Carousel instance.
carouselOptions.name: carouselOptions

closeOnClickOutside.description: Closes the lightbox when a pointer interaction occurs outside its content area.
closeOnClickOutside.name: closeOnClickOutside

counterFormatter.description: Formats the slide counter output based on the current index and total count.
counterFormatter.name: counterFormatter

keepMounted.description: Keeps the lightbox mounted in the DOM when it is not visible.
keepMounted.name: keepMounted

lockScroll.description: Prevents background document scrolling while the lightbox is open.
lockScroll.name: lockScroll

onClose.description: Callback invoked when the lightbox requests to close.
onClose.name: onClose

opened.description: Controls whether the lightbox is visible.
opened.name: opened

overlayProps.description: Props forwarded to the Overlay component that renders the backdrop.
overlayProps.name: overlayProps

portalProps.description: Props forwarded to the Portal component when portal rendering is enabled.
portalProps.name: portalProps

returnFocus.description: Restores focus to the previously focused element after the lightbox closes.
returnFocus.name: returnFocus

transitionProps.description: Transition configuration applied to the lightbox content container.
transitionProps.name: transitionProps

trapFocus.description: Constrains keyboard focus to elements within the lightbox while it is open.
trapFocus.name: trapFocus

withCounter.description: Displays the current slide index and total slide count.
withCounter.name: withCounter

withFullscreen.description: Shows a control that toggles fullscreen mode for the lightbox.
withFullscreen.name: withFullscreen

withThumbnails.description: Renders thumbnail previews for navigating between slides.
withThumbnails.name: withThumbnails

withZoom.description: Shows a control that toggles zoom functionality for the active slide.
withZoom.name: withZoom

withinPortal.description: Renders the lightbox inside a React Portal instead of the current DOM hierarchy.
withinPortal.name: withinPortal

thumbnail.description: Content rendered as the slide thumbnail in the lightbox navigation, or a default placeholder if omitted.
thumbnail.name: thumbnail
